entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times in the morning. Amount possibly more than 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
